job_description: I developed and maintained eCommerce stores using BigCommerce and Shopify, aligning with client requirements and ensuring modern, optimized storefronts through theme migrations and updates. To enhance site functionality, I implemented custom scripts and resolved technical issues while applying SEO best practices. I also managed the companyâ€™s WordPress website by adding new pages and integrating additional features.

Completed an intensive front-end development training program with a focus on React.js and Angular.js frameworks. Demonstrated proficiency through successful completion of technical assessments and active participation in Agile Scrum ceremonies. Gained hands-on experience developing responsive, modern user interfaces aligned with current industry standards.

Participated in the Accenture Technology Learning Program (ATLP), a structured training initiative focused on web development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Git, and responsive design. Strengthened practical skills through guided projects and assessments. Built a full-stack file repository using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
